email.title: Weekly Digest

image.alt: A selection of very festive biscuits
image.title: A festive selection of biscuits with Christmas around the corner!

email.text:
We made it! Welcome to the last week of term. With December exams and code reviews, there's no doubt most of us will be working right until the end. However, that means there's more reason to celebrate, so if you're still around on Saturday, join us for another DoCSoc Bar Night! More details below.
If you're a second year, congratulations on finishing Pintos! It's time to have some well-deserved rest. If you're a third or fourth year with the next week being the final hurdle of the term, we wish you good luck with your exams!
email.heading: Pintos Glasses
email.text: If you're a second year who missed their Pintos glass collection, we'll be doing a final pickup session at 2pm on Tuesday in labs (after the final OS lecture).
email.heading: DoCSoc Merch
email.text:
Head on over to the Union's website to buy DoCSoc-branded hoodies, T-shirts, and beanies. They will be available on the shop until 6pm on Wednesday 26th December, of course at rock-bottom prices thanks to our generous sponsors.
Available here: https://www.imperialcollegeunion.org/shop/club-society-project-products/computing-products
email.heading: IC Hack 19 Organisers
email.text: This year, we're back bigger than ever for IC Hack 19, targeting 400 attendees. With help needed in Logistics, Hacker Experience, Sponsorship, Marketing and more, IC Hack 19 is an opportunity to go beyond the standard role of a volunteer and become a _core organiser_ of a major hackathon. For more information, join the [DoCSoc: Operations](https://www.facebook.com/groups/1509850436007222/) group.
email.heading: Christmas Bar Night

event.text:
DoCSoc's third and final bar night of the term, and final bar night of 2018 is here - the Christmas Bar Night!
We'll be enjoying free drinks (alcoholic or not), celebrating our successes throughout the year, and looking forward to 2019 and beyond! Don't miss it!
Drinks tokens will be given upon entry for FREE to DoCSoc members. Tokens are valid for both alcoholic and non-alcoholic drinks. Note that this event is on a SATURDAY - the day after term ends.
